script:
;;-----------------------------------------
# script "lisp"
# background "bg_black"
# bgm "stop"
;;-----------------------------------------
# body 5303311
# pos 5303311 3
# scale 5303311 0.8 0
# layer 5303311 3
# mask 5303311 off
# alpha 5303311 0 0
# body 502411
# pos 502411 3
# scale 502411 0.8 0
# layer 502411 3
# mask 502411 off
# alpha 502411 0 0
# body 502414
# pos 502414 3
# scale 502414 0.8 0
# layer 502414 3
# mask 502414 off
# alpha 502414 0 0
# body 401021
# pos 401021 3
# scale 401021 0.8 0
# layer 401021 3
# mask 401021 off
# alpha 401021 0 0
# body 401024
# pos 401024 3
# scale 401024 0.8 0
# layer 401024 3
# mask 401024 off
# alpha 401024 0 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# imageset 0 "black"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 1
# imagescale 0 2 0
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.4 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# frameout 0 0
# textwindow "close"
# fadein "black" 1
# waitandnext 1.5

# voice 9967 "wait_10"
# textsize 30
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
# textwindow "nomal"
@
[8A2BE2]〈物語〉シリーズ[-]
コラボ開催中
# waitandnext 3

# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 1

# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# background "eventbg_bake"
# waitandnext 1.5

# voice 9967 "wait_10"
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
# textwindow "nomal"
@
[FF0000]新ユニット[-]
登場
# waitandnext 3

# voice 530331 "hanekawa_kyara_0017"
# textsize 24
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 0
@？？？
何でもは知らないわよ…
知ってる事だけ

# background "bg_black"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 1

# voice 9967 "wait_20"
# background "shirohebi_park"
# bgmfile "bgm443_1" "BgmBakemonogatari" 0
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# se "SE_0575"
# fadein "white" 1
# alpha 5303311 1 0
# textsize 36
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
# textwindow "nomal"
@
羽川 翼

# voice 9967 "wait_10"
# face 5303311 "happy"
# textsize 28
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
@
ピックアップ
[FF0000]5STEPガチャ[-]開催

# voice 9967 "wait_10"
# face 5303311 "shy"
# se "SE_12465"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
@
[FF8000]STEP5[-]で
ピックアップ確率[FF0000]3倍[-]
＋姫型ランダム変更チケットおまけ

# voice 9967 "wait_10"
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
@
STEP5を[FF8000]2周[-]で
羽川 翼[FF0000]1体確定[-]

# voice 9967 "wait_10"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 5303311 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
@
詳しくは
お知らせをチェック！

;;暗転挟む
# imagealpha 0 1 0
# imagepos 0 0 100
# imageleftin 0 1
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 1

# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"

# imagescale 1 1.4 0

# background "aerial_shoot"

# effectpattern 11111 1 0

# imagerightout 0 1
# waitandnext 1.5

# framein 0 1

# textalign "center"

@

2体登場！

@

[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# imageset 0 "black"

# textsize 24
# textboxarrow 0 2
@雑賀
力ってのは
誰かに支えられてるからこそ
生まれるんすよね
